categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lord Goh was a male Chagrian Sith Lord living during the Galactic War. By 3637 BBY Goh became a member of the Order of Revan and joined a fellow Revanite Darth Arkous in planning and executing the attack on Tython. The initial strike was a success, allowing Goh to search the Jedi Temple for a Rakata artifact for Arkous. However, Goh was soon afterwards killed by the Republic strike team sent to retake Tython.

Goh first appeared in game update 2.7 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2014. Goh is part of the "Shadow of Revan prelude" storyline that was released throughout 2014 under the name of "Forged Alliances". He never speaks except during the fight in the Assault on Tython Flashpoint, where he yells words such as "Suffer!", "Worm..." "Scum...".
